name: Big Tech
description: Large technology incumbents with established distribution and infrastructure (Google, Microsoft, Amazon, Apple, Meta)

name: Startup
description: Venture-backed startups and scale-ups building AI-native products and platforms

name: Frontier Lab
description: AI-first research organizations developing foundation models (OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepMind)

name: Open Source
description: Open source projects, foundations, and organizations releasing models and tools
